attributes.action: mandatory time off for bank holidays
attributes.additional_details: Bank holidays should be given to every working individual. They should not be awarded at the discretion of the employer. Currently as it stands some individuals get an extra 8 days off whilst others get none and have to use their allocated annual leave to take time off .  This practice is unfair and certainly outside the boundaries of equal opportunities at work.  What is the point of bank holidays if you never get any?  The government should enforce a mandatory that every individual who goes out to work benefits from the bank holiday system and not face a disadvantage depending on who their employer is.
